'''DMG Bonuses''' are one of the means of increasing [[damage]].

DMG Bonus refers to all percentage-based DMG bonuses, including Elemental and Physical DMG Bonuses, which are listed in the in-game attribute [[Character Menu|menu]]. Other types of Percentage DMG Bonuses (Normal/Charged/Plunging Attack, Elemental Skill, Elemental Burst, etc.) are not shown in the menu, but are still considered Percentage Damage Bonuses. DMG Bonuses from different sources stack additively.

Percentage DMG Bonuses are not to be confused with [[Damage#Additive Base DMG Bonus|Additive Base DMG Bonus]] or [[Damage#Base DMG Multiplier|Base DMG Multiplier]], which are calculated differently in the DMG formula.

==Elemental/Physical==
Elemental and Physical DMG Bonuses are Percentage Damage Bonuses visible as [[attributes]] in the stats screen. Only one of the following Elemental / Physical DMG Bonuses will apply at a time depending on the attack's element. For a list of talents and constellations that boost a particular elemental DMG Bonus, see the corresponding subpage.

===Ascension===
Some characters can increase their Elemental [[Damage]] Bonus [[attribute]] upon [[Character#Ascensions|ascension]]. At Levels 80–90, it is up to 28.8% for 5 star characters and 24.0% for 4 star characters. For {{Color|Physical DMG Bonus}}, it is currently unknown for 5 star characters and 30.0% for 4 star characters.

==Other DMG Bonus==
These DMG bonuses are neither elemental nor physical. They target DMG from specific sources such as Normal/Charged/Plunging Attack DMG, Elemental Skill DMG, Elemental Burst DMG, or all types of DMG.

===Elemental Resonance===
The {{Element|Geo|24}} [[Enduring Rock]] Elemental Resonance increases DMG by 15% for 15s for characters protected by a [[shield]].
